title: Learning-Oriented Leadership Workshop for Strengthening Military Team Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Military Organizational Structures and Basic Leadership Theories
context.additional_context: Strategy acquisition for facilitating team learning in hierarchical organizational settings for current military practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can explain three practical strategies to foster psychological equality in teams with hierarchical differences of four or more levels.
Participants can propose methods to enhance knowledge sharing among team members by 20% or more by applying learning-oriented leadership techniques in project-based scenarios.
Participants analyze team learning barriers in hierarchical environments and develop action plans to overcome them.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
